alert.note: Alert for Graham; Haywood; Macon; Madison; Northern Jackson; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:31PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Macon, northwestern Jackson, southwestern Madison, Swain, Graham and northern Haywood Counties through 215 PM EST... At 130 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Newport to 9 miles east of Gatlinburg to near Andrews. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Sylva, Bryson City, Robbinsville, Waynesville, Cherokee, Cullowhee, Lake Junaluska, Maggie Valley, Hot Springs and Balsam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Graham; Haywood; Macon; Madison; Northern Jackson; Swain
